about_the_game:
Boppio is a factory building and automation game where you build buildings and connect them using Transport Tubes. Items will flow through Transport Tubes and automatically figure out where to go. Build up your factory to construct a space ship and return home!

Build Your Factory


Find resources and construct miners to mine them. Construct more miners to scale up your factory! Build more miners and buildings to expand your factory. More buildings means more production!

Explore Catador

A new mysterious resource has been discovered and a new realm has opened, explore it in the Technology Tier 2 release!

Expand Into Space

Expand into space and return home in the exciting release of Technology Tier 3!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 Desktop (Gnome DE)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.X compatible card
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ubuntu 20.04 with Gnome DE is officially supported. Internet is only required for online play and cloud sync.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 Desktop (Gnome DE)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.8 GHz Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan Compatible Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ubuntu 20.04 with Gnome DE is officially supported. Internet is only required for online play and cloud sync.

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core i3 or Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+ compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 3.8 GHz Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Boppio is a game about obtaining materials, constructing buildings, and assembling a spaceship to return home. In order to succeed you will need to automate and optimize your base. Mine minerals and combine them into new items that will help you build your return vessel.
